justification: B needs wins now and already has a serviceable QB; trading a healthy Tier 1 RB (Xavier Carter) for an Out QB (Logan Clark) conflicts with urgency and expert consensus. While B does target injured buy-lows and likes ceiling, the rationale incorrectly claims ‘now’ value and ignores B’s RB-to-QB roster balance. The offer is value-skewed and timing-incoherent, with minimal, inaccurate explanation.
